definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: meet, encounter, reach (NH id.; Aram. [[פְּגַע]], pga9; poss. akin to Ar. faja0’a, fajiy’a happen to, light upon; faja9a is pain, afflict);—
meet, light upon, c. acc. pers. 1Sa 10:5, Ex 5:20 (J), c. sf. pers. Am 5:19; [[שׁוֹר]] ´[[פ]] Ex 23:4; c. [[ב]] pers. Ge 32:2 (E), Nu 35:19, Nu 35:21 (P); c. [[ב]] loc. Ge 28:11 (E).
meet, with kindness, c. acc. pers. Is 64:5 (subj. ´[[י]]), so Is 47:3 acc. to Ew De Di al.; Che:Hpt [[אֶפְרַע]] (reading, with Du, [[אמר]] for [[אָדָם]]).

encounter with hostility, fall upon c. [[ב]] pers. Jos 2:16 (JE), Ju Jdg 8:21, Jdg 15:12, Jdg 18:25, 1Sa 22:17, 1Sa 22:18, 1Sa 22:18, 2Sa 1:15, 1Ki 2:25, 1Ki 2:29, 1Ki 2:31, 1Ki 2:32, 1Ki 2:34, 1Ki 2:46, Ru 2:22; of God, c. acc. (sf.), + [[ב]] instr. Ex 5:3.
encounter with request, entreat, c. [[ב]] pers. Je 7:16, Job 21:15, sq. cl. Je 27:18, Ru 1:16, + [[ל]] pers. on whose behalf Ge 23:8
strike, touch, of boundary, c. [[ב]] loc. Jos 16:7, Jos 19:11, Jos 19:22, Jos 19:26, Jos 19:27, Jos 19:34, Jos 19:34, cf. Jos 17:10; c. [[אֶל]] loc. Jos 19:11.

definitions.title: Hiph. 1.
definitions.body: cause to light upon, Pf. 3 ms. [[הִפְגִּיעַ]] c. acc. rei + [[ב]] pers. Is 53:6.
cause one (acc.) to entreat 1 S. [[הִפְגַּעְתִּי]] ([[ב]] pers.) Je 15:11 (otherwise Gie; Co del. v. as gloss).
make entreaty, 3 pl. [[הִפְגִּעוּ]] Je 36:25 c. [[ב]] pers.; more gen. interpose, Impf. 3 ms. [[יַפְגִּיעַ]] Is 53:12, c. [[ל]] pers. in whose behalf; Pt. [[מַפְגִּיעַ]] Is 59:16 one interposing.
make attack, only Pt. Job 36:32 assailant, but Ol Bu Du al. [[מִפְגׇּע]] mark.
